definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: These ties among our people are the life blood of our emerging partnership.
sentences.chinese: 我们人民之间的纽带是我们新兴伙伴关系的生命力。

sentences.english: Water is the source of life and the link that binds all living beings on this planet.
sentences.chinese: 水是生命之源，也是维系地球上所有生命的纽带。
我们是联系两家报纸事业的纽带。

sentences.english: Feeding the regional economy of towns , are the ties of urban-rural integration.
sentences.chinese: 小城镇反哺区域经济，是城乡一体化的纽带。

sentences.english: These results have further strengthened China’s bilateral economic ties with the two countries respectively.
sentences.chinese: 这些成果进一步巩固了我同两国的经济纽带。

sentences.english: The only bond worth anything between human beings is their humanness.
sentences.chinese: 人与人之间最宝贵的纽带就是相互之间的仁慈。

sentences.english: I am very glad beautiful in between the economic ligament of growth talks about a few.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴就美中之间增长的经济纽带谈几句。

sentences.english: Yet research shows that the father-child bond is crucial to a kid’s future success.
sentences.chinese: 但是研究表明父子纽带对孩子未来的成功至关重要。

sentences.english: The Alumnae Association is my link to the school's present administration.
sentences.chinese: 女校友协会是我和现在学校行政部门之间的纽带。

sentences.english: Social agencies bridge government and society.
sentences.chinese: 社会中介是政府与杜会的联结纽带。

sentences.english: Because the text, link, hold affection imperceptibly, have deep love.
sentences.chinese: 只因文字，牵起情的纽带，不知不觉里，爱已渐深。

sentences.english: Through conflict, two people can create a deeper understanding of one another and develop a stronger bond.
sentences.chinese: 通过冲突，彼此会加深了解，建立更牢固的纽带。

sentences.english: Imperial examination had been one of the key bonds between the state and society since Sui and Tang Dynasties in the Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 科举是隋唐以来国家与社会联系的关键性纽带。

sentences.english: Emotion tangibly links from one person’s heart into another.
sentences.chinese: 情感是人与人心之间联系的纽带。

sentences.english: Friendship! It is a tie that binds fools and profligates.
sentences.chinese: 友谊只是联结傻瓜和浪荡公子的纽带。

sentences.english: Wen said that language is the link of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 温家宝说，语言是连接友谊的纽带。

definition: to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]
variant of 聯結|联结[lian2 jie2]
